formalpara.title: Figure 3. The pharynx is generated polyclonally
formalpara.para: The C. elegans cell lineage, with emphasis on the sublineages that generate pharyngeal cells (green lines). Pharyngeal cell types are denoted by color: yellow arcade cells, red muscles, purple neurons, orange epithelia, pink marginal cells, brown glands and blue valves. Right-click or control click for high resolution image.
